visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a column chart with the title 'Breadcrumbs in RTL'. The chart should have a category x-axis and a single series named 'Supply' with data points for 'Fruits', 'Vegetables', and 'Meat'. The 'Fruits' data point should be drillable to a secondary series named 'Fruits' with data points for 'Citrus', 'Tropical', and 'Other'. The breadcrumbs for drilldown should be right-aligned and in RTL (right-to-left) format. Additionally, the chart should have custom styling for axes and labels, with specific colors and font sizes. The chart should also include a button that, when clicked, performs a drilldown on the 'Fruits' data point and disables the button afterward.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a column chart with a title 'Breadcrumbs in RTL'. The x-axis is of type 'category', and the y-axis is labeled 'Quantity'. The chart includes a single series named 'Supply' with data points for 'Fruits', 'Vegetables', and 'Meat'. The 'Fruits' data point is drillable to a secondary series named 'Fruits' with data points for 'Citrus', 'Tropical', and 'Other'. The drilldown breadcrumbs are right-aligned and in RTL format. The chart also includes custom styling for titles, axes, and labels with specific colors and font sizes. Additionally, the chart uses custom colors for the series and enables data labels for better readability. The legend is enabled with custom styling. The provided JavaScript code includes an event listener for a button that performs a drilldown on the 'Fruits' data point and disables the button afterward.
